Containers.Name: MirrorShuttle for UNRAID
Containers.Description: MirrorShuttle helps to achieve a very specific security and anti-ransomware oriented workflow for your media server. The tool mirrors the folder structure of your read-only shares into your incoming area, so you can organise files within that mirror structure. MirrorShuttle then moves new content from that structure to the pre-planned locations in the read-only shares, without opening these shares to writes.
